entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
